titles.title: I Waited Patiently For The Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I waited patiently for the Lord
He inclined unto me and He heard my cry.
He lifted me up out of the horrible pit.
Even out of the miry clay.
He set my feet upon the rock.
He established my way.
He hath put a new song in my heart.
Even praise unto our God.
